page.title: 03A Farmer's Year
page.content: My farm is an{upland stock rearing farm.The land lies between 800 and 1000ft. above sea level,and is gently sloping.The{soil}is easily workable,of reasonable depth and is free draining.Most of the farm is{grassland but some{turnips,rape}and new grass seeds are sown to be eaten by the lambs after weaning. We have{sheep,cattle}and two {working dogs.}The{machinery}used is a tractor,loader,a disc harrow,tine harrow and chain harrow We also have a rollmower ,hay rake, baler and bale elevator,a trailer and transport box. In{Autumn}we sell the lambs,best cattle and old ewes.We buy replacement ewes and also heifers,they will calve late next Summer. In{Winter}all the cattle are brought into the building,so they have to be fed and littered and also the
